14/*! \file */
15
16#include <config.h>
17
18#include <isc/result.h>
19
20#include <dns/log.h>
21
22#include <ns/log.h>
23
24#include <isccfg/log.h>
25
26#include <named/log.h>
27
28#ifndef ISC_FACILITY
29#define ISC_FACILITY LOG_DAEMON
30#endif
31
32/*%
33 * When adding a new category, be sure to add the appropriate
34 * \#define to <named/log.h> and to update the list in
35 * bin/check/check-tool.c.
36 */
37static isc_logcategory_t categories[] = {
38 { "", 0 },
39 { "unmatched", 0 },
40 { NULL, 0 }
41};
42
43/*%
44 * When adding a new module, be sure to add the appropriate
45 * \#define to <dns/log.h>.
46 */
47static isc_logmodule_t modules[] = {
48 { "main", 0 },
49 { "server", 0 },
50 { "control", 0 },
51 { NULL, 0 }
52};
53
54isc_result_t
55named_log_init(bool safe) {
56 isc_result_t result;
57 isc_logconfig_t *lcfg = NULL;
58
59 named_g_categories = categories;
60 named_g_modules = modules;
61
62 /*
63 * Setup a logging context.
64 */
65 result = isc_log_create(named_g_mctx, &named_g_lctx, &lcfg);
66 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
67 return (result);
68
69 /*
70 * named-checktool.c:setup_logging() needs to be kept in sync.
71 */
72 isc_log_registercategories(named_g_lctx, named_g_categories);
73 isc_log_registermodules(named_g_lctx, named_g_modules);
74 isc_log_setcontext(named_g_lctx);
75 dns_log_init(named_g_lctx);
76 dns_log_setcontext(named_g_lctx);
77 cfg_log_init(named_g_lctx);
78 ns_log_init(named_g_lctx);
79 ns_log_setcontext(named_g_lctx);
80
81 if (safe)
82 result = named_log_setsafechannels(lcfg);
83 else
84 result = named_log_setdefaultchannels(lcfg);
85 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
86 goto cleanup;
87
88 result = named_log_setdefaultcategory(lcfg);
89 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
90 goto cleanup;
91
92 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
93
94 cleanup:
95 isc_log_destroy(&named_g_lctx);
96 isc_log_setcontext(NULL);
97 dns_log_setcontext(NULL);
98
99 return (result);
100}
101
102isc_result_t
103named_log_setdefaultchannels(isc_logconfig_t *lcfg) {
104 isc_result_t result;
105 isc_logdestination_t destination;
106
107 /*
108 * By default, the logging library makes "default_debug" log to
109 * stderr. In BIND, we want to override this and log to named.run
110 * instead, unless the -g option was given.
111 */
112 if (! named_g_logstderr) {
113 destination.file.stream = NULL;
114 destination.file.name = "named.run";
115 destination.file.versions = ISC_LOG_ROLLNEVER;
116 destination.file.maximum_size = 0;
117 result = isc_log_createchannel(lcfg, "default_debug",
118 ISC_LOG_TOFILE,
119 ISC_LOG_DYNAMIC,
120 &destination,
121 ISC_LOG_PRINTTIME|
122 ISC_LOG_DEBUGONLY);
123 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
124 goto cleanup;
125 }
126
127 if (named_g_logfile != NULL) {
128 destination.file.stream = NULL;
129 destination.file.name = named_g_logfile;
130 destination.file.versions = ISC_LOG_ROLLNEVER;
131 destination.file.maximum_size = 0;
132 result = isc_log_createchannel(lcfg, "default_logfile",
133 ISC_LOG_TOFILE,
134 ISC_LOG_DYNAMIC,
135 &destination,
136 ISC_LOG_PRINTTIME|
137 ISC_LOG_PRINTCATEGORY|
138 ISC_LOG_PRINTLEVEL);
139 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
140 goto cleanup;
141 }
142
143#if ISC_FACILITY != LOG_DAEMON
144 destination.facility = ISC_FACILITY;
145 result = isc_log_createchannel(lcfg, "default_syslog",
146 ISC_LOG_TOSYSLOG, ISC_LOG_INFO,
147 &destination, 0);
148 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
149 goto cleanup;
150#endif
151
152 /*
153 * Set the initial debug level.
154 */
155 isc_log_setdebuglevel(named_g_lctx, named_g_debuglevel);
156
157 result = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
158
159 cleanup:
160 return (result);
161}
162
163isc_result_t
164named_log_setsafechannels(isc_logconfig_t *lcfg) {
165 isc_result_t result;
166 isc_logdestination_t destination;
167
168 if (! named_g_logstderr) {
169 result = isc_log_createchannel(lcfg, "default_debug",
170 ISC_LOG_TONULL,
171 ISC_LOG_DYNAMIC,
172 NULL, 0);
173 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
174 goto cleanup;
175
176 /*
177 * Setting the debug level to zero should get the output
178 * discarded a bit faster.
179 */
180 isc_log_setdebuglevel(named_g_lctx, 0);
181 } else {
182 isc_log_setdebuglevel(named_g_lctx, named_g_debuglevel);
183 }
184
185 if (named_g_logfile != NULL) {
186 destination.file.stream = NULL;
187 destination.file.name = named_g_logfile;
188 destination.file.versions = ISC_LOG_ROLLNEVER;
189 destination.file.maximum_size = 0;
190 result = isc_log_createchannel(lcfg, "default_logfile",
191 ISC_LOG_TOFILE,
192 ISC_LOG_DYNAMIC,
193 &destination,
194 ISC_LOG_PRINTTIME|
195 ISC_LOG_PRINTCATEGORY|
196 ISC_LOG_PRINTLEVEL);
197 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
198 goto cleanup;
199 }
200
201#if ISC_FACILITY != LOG_DAEMON
202 destination.facility = ISC_FACILITY;
203 result = isc_log_createchannel(lcfg, "default_syslog",
204 ISC_LOG_TOSYSLOG, ISC_LOG_INFO,
205 &destination, 0);
206 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
207 goto cleanup;
208#endif
209
210 result = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
211
212 cleanup:
213 return (result);
214}
215
216isc_result_t
217named_log_setdefaultcategory(isc_logconfig_t *lcfg) {
218 isc_result_t result = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
219
220 result = isc_log_usechannel(lcfg, "default_debug",
221 ISC_LOGCATEGORY_DEFAULT, NULL);
222 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
223 goto cleanup;
224
225 if (! named_g_logstderr) {
226 if (named_g_logfile != NULL)
227 result = isc_log_usechannel(lcfg, "default_logfile",
228 ISC_LOGCATEGORY_DEFAULT,
229 NULL);
230 else if (! named_g_nosyslog)
231 result = isc_log_usechannel(lcfg, "default_syslog",
232 ISC_LOGCATEGORY_DEFAULT,
233 NULL);
234 }
235
236 cleanup:
237 return (result);
238}
239
240isc_result_t
241named_log_setunmatchedcategory(isc_logconfig_t *lcfg) {
242 isc_result_t result;
243
244 result = isc_log_usechannel(lcfg, "null",
245 NAMED_LOGCATEGORY_UNMATCHED, NULL);
246 return (result);
247}
248
249void
250named_log_shutdown(void) {
251 isc_log_destroy(&named_g_lctx);
252 isc_log_setcontext(NULL);
253 dns_log_setcontext(NULL);
254}
